mapper.select: select cart_idx,member_id,A.book_code,A.quantity,reg_date,B.book_name,B.price,B.book_img from tbl_cart as A INNER JOIN tbl_book AS B on B.book_code=A.book_code where member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cart where cart_idx=#{cart_idx} AND member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_cart SET quantity = quantity+#{quantity} where book_code = #{book_code} and member_id=#{member_id}
